Texts.Chs: 把^orange;蜂蜜酒^reset;带给这名^orange;酒鬼^reset;。 (位于^orange;科学前哨站^reset;)
Texts.Eng: Bring the ^orange;mead^reset; to ^green;the drunk^reset; at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;

Texts.Chs: 我已经，*嗝*，没有东西可以教你了。酿^green;蜂蜜酒^reset;，要^orange;纯蜂蜜^reset;，好好感受用心酿酒的...感觉！当你酿出来后，请务必给，*嗝*，我带点！
Texts.Eng: I's not able ter *hic* do much ter help. Make ^green;mead^reset;. Hard work. You'll need to find shome ^orange;Pure Honey^reset; and purpare fer a complimicated brewing process. Bring some for me to *hic* taste when you're done!

Texts.Chs: 你真的做到了！现在你可以称呼自己为酿酒大师了。
Texts.Eng: You did it. Now you can truly call yourself a brewer.
